titleStmt.title: A case of conscience, whether it be lawful to admit Jews into a Christian common-wealth? / Resolved by Mr John Dury: written to Samuel Hartlib, esquire.
titleStmt.author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Wodenothe, in Leaden-Hall street, next to the Golden Heart,
